title: Pan-Xu conjecture and reduction formulas for polylogarithms
abstract:
The objective of the paper is the study of Mneimneh-like sums with a
parametric variant of the multiple harmonic-star values. We generalize and
resolve the Pan-Xu conjecture on generalized Mneimneh-like sums and present
their transformation. As an application, we deduce new reduction formulas for
specific multiple polylogarithms enabling lowering their depth, and provide
additional findings on arithmetic means of multiple harmonic-star values,
resulting in new representations of arbitrary multiple zeta-star values.
